title: Modified aryldifluorophenylsilicates with improved activity and selectivity in nucleophilic fluorination of secondary substrates
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22326-22334
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04332D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Michal Trojan, Adam Hroch, Evelin Gruden, Josef Cvačka, Jan Čejka, Gašper Tavčar, Markéta Rybáčková, Jaroslav Kvíčala
Difluorosilicates with MeO group(s) gave improved nucleophilic fluorination activity and selectivity of secondary substrates, while the CF3 group gave inferior results.
